# AGNXI - Agent Skills Directory

> Find agent skills for Claude Code, Cursor, Windsurf and other AI coding tools.

## Summary

AGNXI is a community-driven catalog of AI coding agent skills hosted on public GitHub repositories. It helps developers discover, evaluate, and install skills (SKILL.md files) for popular AI coding agents including Claude Code, Amp Code, Cursor, Windsurf, and more.

## Key Pages

- `/` - Home page with featured skills and search
- `/skills` - Browse all skills with search and filters
- `/skills/[owner]/[slug]` - Individual skill detail page
- `/categories` - Browse skills by category
- `/categories/[slug]` - Skills filtered by specific category
- `/[owner]` - Owner/organization profile with their skills
- `/ranking` - Skills ranking by popularity
- `/submit` - Submit a new skill to the directory
- `/about` - About the project
- `/privacy` - Privacy policy
- `/cookies` - Cookie policy
- `/terms` - Terms of service

## Categories

Skills are organized into the following categories:

- **LLMs & Models** - AI, LLMs, and machine learning tools
- **Data & Analytics** - Data processing, analytics, and database tools
- **Coding & Development** - Frontend, backend, and fullstack development
- **Mobile** - iOS, Android, and cross-platform mobile development
- **Automation & Agents** - CI/CD, workflows, and automation tools
- **Security** - Authentication, encryption, and security tools
- **Dev Tools** - Git, CLI, editors, and developer utilities
- **Business & Productivity** - Workflow and productivity tools
- **Writing & Content** - CMS, documentation, and content tools
- **Design & Creative** - UI/UX design and creative tools

## API Endpoints

Public API endpoints for programmatic access:

- `GET /api/skills` - List skills with optional filters (q, categories, owner, status)
- `GET /api/categories` - List all categories
- `GET /api/owners/[owner]` - Get owner profile and skills
- `GET /api/stats` - Get site statistics

## Feeds

- `/feed.xml` - RSS feed of latest skills
- `/atom.xml` - Atom feed of latest skills
- `/sitemap.xml` - XML sitemap for search engines

## Content Structure

### Skill Detail Pages
Each skill page includes:
- Name, description, and author information
- GitHub repository link and star count
- Full SKILL.md content rendered as markdown
- Installation instructions
- Related skills in the same category
- Report functionality for inappropriate content

### Owner Profile Pages
Owner pages display:
- GitHub profile information (avatar, name, bio)
- List of all skills published by that owner/organization
- Verified organization badge (if applicable)

## Technical Details

- Built with Next.js 16 and React 19
- Data synced from public GitHub repositories
- Skills are curated via community submissions
- Categories assigned automatically via AI and keyword matching

- Twitter: @agnxi
